on.from sentence:
Results
The BLSTM - 2DCNN model achieves excellent performance on 4 out of 6 tasks .

52.4 % and 89.5 %.from sentence: Especially , it achieves 52.4 % and 89.5 % test accuracies on SST - 1 and SST - 2 respectively .

BLSTM - 2DPooling.from sentence: BLSTM - 2DPooling performs worse than the state - of - the - art models .

BLSTM - CNN.from sentence: BLSTM - CNN beats all baselines on SST - 1 , SST - 2 , and TREC datasets .

Subj and MR datasets.from sentence: As for Subj and MR datasets , BLSTM - 2DCNN gets a second higher accuracies .

BLSTM - 2DCNN.from sentence: Compared with RCNN , BLSTM - 2DCNN achieves a comparable result .

proposed two models.from sentence: Compared with ReNN , the proposed two models do not depend on external language - specific features such as dependency parse trees .

BLSTM - 2DCNN.from sentence: Compared with DSCNN , BLSTM - 2DCNN outperforms it on five datasets .
